title: STEM Inquiry Projects for Adult Learners: Remote Laboratories and Real-World Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Targeting general citizens in their 40s+ with elementary-aged children: STEM-based projects for solving community issues, utilizing smartphone-based RAL (Remote Access Laboratory)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-life STEM problems through inquiry-based methods
Learners collect and interpret experimental data using smartphone-based RAL tools
Through team collaboration, learners design and implement community problem-solving projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
